/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
